name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (Koce)
description:
Controls
  • WSAD or arrow keys to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left mouse button to shoot
  • Right mouse button for melee attack
  • Scroll wheel to change the weapon
  • R to reload
Wowie 4.0

This game was made for the Wowie 4.0 game jam. The theme was "Collaborate with AI". This game kinda fits the theme because you have an invisible AI companion that gives you some advice.
